Package controller

Class Room

java.lang.Object
java.util.Observable
controller.Room
All Implemented Interfaces:
Closeable, AutoCloseable
public class Room extends Observable implements Closeable
This class acts as an instance game of blackjack and handles all the actions requested while updating a GameTracker object accordingly. This class also accepts observers and updates them when GameTracker is updated.
See Also:
Observable, GameTracker, GameConnection, RoomTracker

    Description
    Room​(String roomCode)
    Creates a room instance with a room code and does some preparations for a game start.

  • Constructor Details

    • Room

      public Room​(String roomCode)
      Creates a room instance with a room code and does some preparations for a game start.
      Parameters:
      roomCode - the room code that leads to this instance

  • Method Details

    • startGame

      public void startGame​(GameConnection gc)
      Starts a game of black jack by creating a gameTracker and starts the first turn.
      Parameters:
      gc - the connection calling this command
      See Also:
      GameTracker(Player...), GameTracker.next(), Observable.notifyObservers()

    • bet

      public void bet​(int chips, GameConnection gc)
      Sets a bet to the current Hand and removes the amount from the Player balance
      Parameters:
      chips - the amount chips bet
      gc - the connection sending this command
      See Also:
      Hand.betChips(int), Player.transactChips(int), Observable.notifyObservers()

    • hit

      public void hit​(GameConnection gc)
      Adds a new card to the hand from the deck. If the hand point total is 21 or above a stand is automatically executed.
      Parameters:
      gc - the connection sending this command
      See Also:
      GameTracker.nextCard(), stand(GameConnection), Observable.notifyObservers()

    • stand

      public void stand​(GameConnection gc)
      The current turn ends and the next hand in the turnorder start its turn. If the hand belongs to the dealer then the ai starts. If the turnorder reaches its end then all the winning are dealt to the players.
      Parameters:
      gc - the connection sending this command
      See Also:
      GameTracker.next(), runDealerAI(), Observable.notifyObservers()

    • doubleDown

      public void doubleDown​(GameConnection gc)
      The current hand does one hit and afterwards does a stand. The bet is multiplied by 1.5x while doing this.
      Parameters:
      gc - the connection sending this command
      See Also:
      hit(GameConnection), stand(GameConnection), Hand.betChips(int), Observable.notifyObservers()

    • split

      public void split​(GameConnection gc)
      The current hand that has two cards of the same rank can split the card into two separate hands for the same player. The other hand is set right after the current hand in the turn order.
      Parameters:
      gc - The connection sending this command
      See Also:
      Hand.getAndRemoveLastCard(), Hand.addCard(Card), GameTracker.insertNext(Hand), Observable.notifyObservers()

    • runDealerAI

      public void runDealerAI()
      An algorithm is run for the current hand where it hits until the hand value is 17 or above and then stands.
      See Also:
      Hand.addCard(Card), Hand.getPoints(), GameTracker.nextCard()

    • notifyObservers

      public void notifyObservers()
      Sends a JSON string in the format of GameModel to all Observers
      Overrides:
      notifyObservers in class Observable
      See Also:
      GameConnection.update(Observable, Object), GameModel(GameTracker, String), Observable.notifyObservers(Object)

    • addObserver

      public void addObserver​(GameConnection gc)
      Adds an observer and also adds the connection to the list of players
      Parameters:
      gc - the connection to be added as a player in the next game
      See Also:
      Observable.addObserver(Observer)

    • close

      public void close() throws IOException
      Closes the Sockets inside the connections associated with the room
      Specified by:

      Specified by:

    • playerExists

      public boolean playerExists​(String playerName)
      Checks if a player with an active connection with the requested player nmae is in the room
      Parameters:
      playerName - the name to be checked
      Returns:
      a boolean if that player name is used
